info.title: Transmate APIs
info.description:
description of the apis of transmate
# Introduction
Transmate has multiple api available:

tags.name: SeaDistance
tags.description:
API to calculate Sea distances, and lead time, used internally to get rate estimations. api to get estimated miles and leadtimes for port to port routes leadtimes is an estimated lead time for container traffic,  to get an estimated travel time you can divide the distance by the speed of the vessel (something between 10 and 20 knots)
type=distance only works with lat lng or names, not unlocs

request.name: UAB Tanklita
request.description: out partner for sea freight in EU

error.message: env not set, check your authentication keys!

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://7b84f578.eu-de.apigw.appdomain.cloud/TransmateCustomerApi/partner \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"type":"shipment","request":{"addToExistingContacts":true,"ediId":"123456789","name":"City Of London Courier Ltd","description":"City Of London Courier Ltd is your trusted partner operating from United Kingdom. City Of London Courier Ltd is specialized in transport, seafreight, container","profile":{"services":["container"],"certificates":[""],"footprint":["gb"],"contacts":[{}],"sites":[{"name":"main","url":"http://www.cityoflondoncourier.com"}],"locations":[{"name":"office","address":"Digby Road, 0","PC":"E9","place":"0","country":"gb","location":{"lat":51.5472717,"lng":-0.0444384},"locationType":["office"],"shippingModes":["road"],"addressValidatedBy":"Google"}]},"features":["string"],"type":"carrier","deleted":false,"status":"requested"},"version":"1","env":{"accountId":"string","userId":"string","target":"string"}}'

echo '{"type":"shipment","request":{"addToExistingContacts":true,"ediId":"123456789","name":"City Of London Courier Ltd","description":"City Of London Courier Ltd is your trusted partner operating from United Kingdom. City Of London Courier Ltd is specialized in transport, seafreight, container","profile":{"services":["container"],"certificates":[""],"footprint":["gb"],"contacts":[{}],"sites":[{"name":"main","url":"http://www.cityoflondoncourier.com"}],"locations":[{"name":"office","address":"Digby Road, 0","PC":"E9","place":"0","country":"gb","location":{"lat":51.5472717,"lng":-0.0444384},"locationType":["office"],"shippingModes":["road"],"addressValidatedBy":"Google"}]},"features":["string"],"type":"carrier","deleted":false,"status":"requested"},"version":"1","env":{"accountId":"string","userId":"string","target":"string"}}' |  \
  http POST https://7b84f578.eu-de.apigw.appdomain.cloud/TransmateCustomerApi/partner \
  content-type:application/json

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("7b84f578.eu-de.apigw.appdomain.cloud")

payload = "{\"type\":\"shipment\",\"request\":{\"addToExistingContacts\":true,\"ediId\":\"123456789\",\"name\":\"City Of London Courier Ltd\",\"description\":\"City Of London Courier Ltd is your trusted partner operating from United Kingdom. City Of London Courier Ltd is specialized in transport, seafreight, container\",\"profile\":{\"services\":[\"container\"],\"certificates\":[\"\"],\"footprint\":[\"gb\"],\"contacts\":[{}],\"sites\":[{\"name\":\"main\",\"url\":\"http://www.cityoflondoncourier.com\"}],\"locations\":[{\"name\":\"office\",\"address\":\"Digby Road, 0\",\"PC\":\"E9\",\"place\":\"0\",\"country\":\"gb\",\"location\":{\"lat\":51.5472717,\"lng\":-0.0444384},\"locationType\":[\"office\"],\"shippingModes\":[\"road\"],\"addressValidatedBy\":\"Google\"}]},\"features\":[\"string\"],\"type\":\"carrier\",\"deleted\":false,\"status\":\"requested\"},\"version\":\"1\",\"env\":{\"accountId\":\"string\",\"userId\":\"string\",\"target\":\"string\"}}"

headers = { 'content-type': "application/json" }

conn.request("POST", "/TransmateCustomerApi/partner", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://7b84f578.eu-de.apigw.appdomain.cloud/TransmateCustomerApi/partner",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"type\":\"shipment\",\"request\":{\"addToExistingContacts\":true,\"ediId\":\"123456789\",\"name\":\"City Of London Courier Ltd\",\"description\":\"City Of London Courier Ltd is your trusted partner operating from United Kingdom. City Of London Courier Ltd is specialized in transport, seafreight, container\",\"profile\":{\"services\":[\"container\"],\"certificates\":[\"\"],\"footprint\":[\"gb\"],\"contacts\":[{}],\"sites\":[{\"name\":\"main\",\"url\":\"http://www.cityoflondoncourier.com\"}],\"locations\":[{\"name\":\"office\",\"address\":\"Digby Road, 0\",\"PC\":\"E9\",\"place\":\"0\",\"country\":\"gb\",\"location\":{\"lat\":51.5472717,\"lng\":-0.0444384},\"locationType\":[\"office\"],\"shippingModes\":[\"road\"],\"addressValidatedBy\":\"Google\"}]},\"features\":[\"string\"],\"type\":\"carrier\",\"deleted\":false,\"status\":\"requested\"},\"version\":\"1\",\"env\":{\"accountId\":\"string\",\"userId\":\"string\",\"target\":\"string\"}}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('https://7b84f578.eu-de.apigw.appdomain.cloud/TransmateCustomerApi/partner');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_POST);

$request->setHeaders([
  'content-type' => 'application/json'
]);

$request->setBody('{"type":"shipment","request":{"addToExistingContacts":true,"ediId":"123456789","name":"City Of London Courier Ltd","description":"City Of London Courier Ltd is your trusted partner operating from United Kingdom. City Of London Courier Ltd is specialized in transport, seafreight, container","profile":{"services":["container"],"certificates":[""],"footprint":["gb"],"contacts":[{}],"sites":[{"name":"main","url":"http://www.cityoflondoncourier.com"}],"locations":[{"name":"office","address":"Digby Road, 0","PC":"E9","place":"0","country":"gb","location":{"lat":51.5472717,"lng":-0.0444384},"locationType":["office"],"shippingModes":["road"],"addressValidatedBy":"Google"}]},"features":["string"],"type":"carrier","deleted":false,"status":"requested"},"version":"1","env":{"accountId":"string","userId":"string","target":"string"}}');

try {

} catch (HttpException $ex) {

City Of London Courier Ltd is specialized in transport, seafreight, container","profile":{"services":["container"],"certificates":[""],"footprint":["gb"],"contacts":[{}],"sites":[{"name":"main","url":"http://www.cityoflondoncourier.com"}],"locations":[{"name":"office","address":"Digby Road, 0","PC":"E9","place":"0","country":"gb","location":{"lat":51.5472717,"lng":-0.0444384},"locationType":["office"],"shippingModes":["road"],"addressValidatedBy":"Google"}]},"features":["string"],"type":"carrier","deleted":false,"status":"requested"},"version":"1","env":{"accountId":"string","userId":"string","target":"string"}}');

post.summary: Get the sea distance between two ports.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://7b84f578.eu-de.apigw.appdomain.cloud/public/seaDistance \
  --header 'apiKey: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"type":"leadtime","from":"IDJKT","to":"IDJKT"}'

echo '{"type":"leadtime","from":"IDJKT","to":"IDJKT"}' |  \
  http POST https://7b84f578.eu-de.apigw.appdomain.cloud/public/seaDistance \
  apiKey:REPLACE_KEY_VALUE \
  content-type:application/json

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("7b84f578.eu-de.apigw.appdomain.cloud")

payload = "{\"type\":\"leadtime\",\"from\":\"IDJKT\",\"to\":\"IDJKT\"}"

headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'apiKey': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/public/seaDistance", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://7b84f578.eu-de.apigw.appdomain.cloud/public/seaDistance",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"type\":\"leadtime\",\"from\":\"IDJKT\",\"to\":\"IDJKT\"}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "apiKey: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('https://7b84f578.eu-de.apigw.appdomain.cloud/public/seaDistance');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_POST);

$request->setHeaders([
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'apiKey' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

$request->setBody('{"type":"leadtime","from":"IDJKT","to":"IDJKT"}');

  $response = $request->send();

} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

<?php

$client = new http\Client;
$request = new http\Client\Request;

$body = new http\Message\Body;
$body->append('{"type":"leadtime","from":"IDJKT","to":"IDJKT"}');

$request->setRequestUrl('https://7b84f578.eu-de.apigw.appdomain.cloud/public/seaDistance');
$request->setRequestMethod('POST');
$request->setBody($body);

$request->setHeaders([
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'apiKey' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

$client->enqueue($request)->send();
$response = $client->getResponse();

echo $response->getBody();

api_key.name: apiKey
api_key.description: must be in header of request

ErrorResponse.description: Container object for one or more errors returned by the API.

Error.description: An error object returned by the API.

status.description: The HTTP status code applicable to this problem expressed as a string

title.description: Short human-readable summary of the problem

detail.description: Optional longer form human-readable explanation tailored to be specific to this specific occurence of the problem.

pointer.description: A string containing a JSON pointer to the specific field within a received JSON body that caused the problem, e.g. '/data/attributes/title' to refer to the `title` property within the `attributes` object that is a child of the top level `data` object.

parameter.description: A string containing a reference to a specific query parameter that has caused the problem.
